name: Haunted Rooms
description:
Haunted Rooms

Haunt objects to help this ghost reach his dreams of scaring everyone.
Use WASD to move and Space to haunt.

Programming and Level Design - QuietBenchZen

  • Website - QuietBenchZen.com

Level Design - Jhifara 

Tileset - Modern Interiors by LimeZu

Sound Effects - Game Master Audio

Font - Kenpixel by Kenney

Music -"Time to Puzzle it Up!" by Spring

Created for Weekly Game Jam 192 - "Haunted Object"
